file_auditing.comment: Set to true to enable file auditing, specify the config file path

registry_auditing.comment: Set to true to enable registry auditing.  Set the path to the file containing the registry keys to audit

powershell_logging.comment: Set to true to enable PowerShell logging.  Set output path for script block transcriptions

special_logging.comment: Set to true to enable logging of non-standard Windows logs.  Set the path to the config file
